title: Small Repairs
headline: A repair service designed to simplify home maintenance outside the summer season
intro: Easily book your small repair service and let our team assess your needs, organize and coordinate every step of the process. We take care of every detail from the initial evaluation to final completion, ensuring smooth and efficient management.

commitment.title: Strict Adherence to Our Service Charter
commitment.text: At Sahel, we strictly adhere to our internal service charter to ensure top-quality service. This document outlines all the procedures we apply to each intervention for consistent and impeccable results. From using eco-friendly products to secure access handling, deadlines, and client follow-up, every part of our work is held to rigorous standards. This ensures a professional service that meets your expectations and gives you peace of mind.

specs.title: Service Specifications - Small Repairs
specs.intro: We provide services at home to carry out small maintenance, repair, or improvement tasks, following a clear and secure process.

types.title: Types of Covered Work
types.point1: Light plumbing: Leak repairs, joint replacement, faucet work, simple pipe unclogging, etc.
types.point2: Painting: Painting a room, ceiling, or woodwork (wall preparation not included unless stated).
types.point3: Carpentry / Maintenance: Shelf installation, furniture repair, door/window adjustment, small assemblies.
types.point4: Basic electricity: Replacing switches, wall sockets, light bulbs (no electrical panels).
types.point5: Various repairs: Minor fixes (fence, shutter, simple lock repair, etc.).

process.title: Intervention Process
process.step1: 1. Quote request: The client describes their needs through our online platform.
process.step2: 2. On-site evaluation: A professional visits to assess feasibility and define the needs (travel costs included if the quote is accepted).
process.step3: 3. Quote validation: A detailed quote (labor + materials if supplied by us) and a timeline are sent via the platform.
process.step4: 4. Payment and planning: The client validates and pays the quote online to start the work.
process.step5: 5. Execution: Work is carried out on the agreed dates, with a photo of completed tasks sent via the platform.

limits.title: Service Limitations
limits.point1: No heavy work: No new constructions, major demolitions or full renovations.
limits.point2: No hazardous work: Roofing, high voltage electricity, gas, asbestos, etc.
limits.point3: No systematic supply of materials: Unless explicitly stated in the quote.
limits.point4: No ten-year warranty: These are minor works (not covered by ten-year legal guarantees).

extra.title: Additional Exclusions
extra.point1: Material purchase: The client may provide materials or purchase them through our quote.
extra.point2: Non-evaluated work: Any task not listed in the original quote will be billed separately.
extra.point3: Mandatory platform use: Any request made outside the platform (phone, SMS, etc.) will not be honored.

conditions.point1: Cancellation: Free up to 48h before the intervention. After that, fees may apply.
conditions.point2: Payment: 100% upon quote approval (unless otherwise agreed for large amounts).
conditions.point3: Timelines: Indicative and subject to external factors (weather, material availability).
conditions.point4: Photos: Serve as proof of completion
